title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-1.4 - Special equalization ratios
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-1.4 - Special equalization ratios

State Regulations
(a) This section applies to special State
equalization ratios for the fiscal year ending in 1997 and subsequent fiscal
years. (b) Tentative special
equalization ratios are computed and determined in accordance with the
procedures for the special State equalization ratios for the appropriate fiscal
year. (c) Complaints against
tentative special State equalization ratios shall be governed by the provisions
of Subpart 8186-15 of this Part. (d) Correction of a significant error and
recomputation of a tentative special State equalization ratio will be done in
accordance with the provisions of section
8186-2.8
of this Part. If a complaint against the tentative ratios has been filed, a
significant error may be corrected in accordance with the provisions of Subpart
8186-15 of this Part. (e) Final
special State equalization ratios are established in accordance with the
procedures for the appropriate fiscal year. Final ratios may be rescinded and
reestablished in accordance with the procedures for the appropriate fiscal
year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
